   20: -module(io_proto_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   26: 
   27: -export([setopts_getopts/1,unicode_options/1,unicode_options_gen/1, 
   28: 	 binary_options/1, read_modes_gl/1,
   29: 	 read_modes_ogl/1, broken_unicode/1,eof_on_pipe/1,unicode_prompt/1]).
   30: 
   31: 
   32: -export([io_server_proxy/1,start_io_server_proxy/0, proxy_getall/1, 
   33: 	 proxy_setnext/2, proxy_quit/1]).
   34: %% For spawn
   35: -export([toerl_server/3,answering_machine1/3,
   36: 	 answering_machine2/3]).
   37: 
   38: -export([uprompt/1]).
   39: 
   40: %%-define(without_test_server, true).
   41: 
   42: -ifdef(without_test_server).
   43: -define(line, put(line, ?LINE), ).
   44: -define(config(X,Y), foo).
   45: -define(t, test_server).
   46: -define(privdir(_), "./io_SUITE_priv").
   47: -else.
   48: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   49: -define(privdir(Conf), proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Conf)).
   50: -endif.
   51: 
   52: %%-define(debug, true).
   53: 
   54: -ifdef(debug).
   55: -define(format(S, A), io:format(S, A)).
   56: -define(dbg(Data),io:format(standard_error, "DBG: ~p\r\n",[Data])).
   57: -define(RM_RF(Dir),begin io:format(standard_error, "Not Removed: ~p\r\n",[Dir]), 
   58: 			 ok end).
   59: -else.
   60: -define(format(S, A), ok).
   61: -define(dbg(Data),noop).
   62: -define(RM_RF(Dir),rm_rf(Dir)).
   63: -endif.
   64: 
   65: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   66:     Term = os:getenv("TERM", "dumb"),
   67:     os:putenv("TERM","vt100"),
   68:     [{term, Term} | Config].
   69: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   70:     Term = proplists:get_value(term,Config),
   71:     os:putenv("TERM",Term),
   72:     ok.
   73: 
   74: suite() ->
   75:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   76:      {timetrap,{minutes,5}}].
   77: 
   78: all() -> 
   79:     [setopts_getopts, unicode_options, unicode_options_gen,
   80:      binary_options, read_modes_gl, read_modes_ogl,
   81:      broken_unicode, eof_on_pipe, unicode_prompt].
   82: 
   83: groups() -> 
   84:     [].
   85: 
   86: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   87:     DefShell = get_default_shell(),
   88:     [{default_shell,DefShell}|Config].
   89: 
   90: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   91:     ok.
   92: 
   93: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   94:     Config.
   95: 
   96: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   97:     Config.
   98: 
   99: 
  100: 
  101: -record(state, {
  102: 	  q = [],
  103: 	  nxt = eof,
  104: 	  mode = list
  105: 	 }).
  106: 
  107: uprompt(_L) ->
  108:     [1050,1072,1082,1074,1086,32,1077,32,85,110,105,99,111,100,101,32,63].
  109: 
  110: %% Test that an Unicode prompt does not crash the shell.
  111: unicode_prompt(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  112:     PA = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
  113:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  114: 	old ->
  115: 	    ok;
  116: 	new ->
  117: 	    rtnode([{putline,""},
  118: 		    {putline, "2."},
  119: 		    {getline, "2"},
  120: 		    {putline, "shell:prompt_func({io_proto_SUITE,uprompt})."},
  121: 		    {getline, "default"},
  122: 		    {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  123: 		    {putline, "hej"},
  124: 		    {getline, "\"hej\\n\""},
  125: 		    {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  126: 		    {getline, "ok"},
  127: 		    {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  128: 		    {putline, "hej"},
  129: 		    {getline, "<<\"hej\\n\">>"}
  130: 		   ],[],[],"-pa \""++ PA++"\"")
  131:     end,
  132:     %% And one with oldshell
  133:     rtnode([{putline,""},
  134: 	    {putline, "2."},
  135: 	    {getline_re, ".*2$"},
  136: 	    {putline, "shell:prompt_func({io_proto_SUITE,uprompt})."},
  137: 	    {getline_re, ".*default"},
  138: 	    {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  139: 	    {putline, "hej"},
  140: 	    {getline_re, ".*\"hej\\\\n\""},
  141: 	    {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  142: 	    {getline_re, ".*ok"},
  143: 	    {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  144: 	    {putline, "hej"},
  145: 	    {getline_re, ".*<<\"hej\\\\n\">>"}
  146: 	   ],[],[],"-oldshell -pa \""++PA++"\""),
  147:     ok.
  148: 
  149: 
  150: %% Check io:setopts and io:getopts functions.
  151: setopts_getopts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  152:     FileName = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  153: 			      "io_proto_SUITE_setopts_getopts.dat"]),
  154:     {ok,WFile} = file:open(FileName,[write]),
  155:     Server = start_io_server_proxy(),
  156:     [{binary, false}] = io:getopts(Server),
  157:     [getopts] = proxy_getall(Server),
  158:     [{binary,false},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(WFile)),
  159:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"),
  160:     "Hej" = io:get_line(Server,''),
  161:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"++[532]),
  162:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_line(Server,''),
  163:     ok = io:setopts(Server,[{binary,true}]),
  164:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"),
  165:     <<"Hej">> = io:get_line(Server,''),
  166:     proxy_setnext(Server,"Hej"++[532]),
  167:     <<72,101,106,200,148>> = io:get_line(Server,''),
  168:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~ts",[<<72,101,106,200,148>>])),
  169:     file:write(WFile,<<"HejA">>),
  170:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,unicode)),
  171:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf16,big})),
  172:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf16,little})),
  173:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf32,big})),
  174:     file:write(WFile,unicode:characters_to_binary("Hej"++[532],unicode,{utf32,little})),
  175:     file:close(WFile),
  176:     {ok,RFile} = file:open(FileName,[read]),
  177:     [{binary,false},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  178:     [$H,$e,$j,$A] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  179:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  180:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  181:     [{binary,false},{encoding,unicode}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  182:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,big}}]),
  183:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  184:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf16,big}}] =
  185: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  186:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,little}}]),
  187:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  188:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf16,little}}] =
  189: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  190:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,big}}]),
  191:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  192:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf32,big}}] =
  193: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  194:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,little}}]),
  195:     [$H,$e,$j,532] = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  196:     [{binary,false},{encoding,{utf32,little}}] =
  197: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  198:     eof = io:get_line(RFile,''),
  199:     file:position(RFile,0),
  200:     io:setopts(RFile,[{binary,true},{encoding,latin1}]),
  201:     <<$H,$e,$j,$A>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  202:     [{binary,true},{encoding,latin1}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  203:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  204:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  205:     [{binary,true},{encoding,unicode}] = lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  206:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,big}}]),
  207:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  208:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf16,big}}] =
  209: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  210:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf16,little}}]),
  211:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  212:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf16,little}}] =
  213: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  214:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,big}}]),
  215:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  216:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf32,big}}] =
  217: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  218:     io:setopts(RFile,[{encoding,{utf32,little}}]),
  219:     <<$H,$e,$j,532/utf8>> = io:get_chars(RFile,'',4),
  220:     [{binary,true},{encoding,{utf32,little}}] =
  221: 	lists:sort(io:getopts(RFile)),
  222:     eof = io:get_line(RFile,''),
  223:     file:close(RFile),
  224:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  225: 	old ->
  226: 	    ok;
  227: 	new ->
  228: 	    %% So, lets test another node with new interactive shell
  229: 	    rtnode([{putline,""},
  230: 		    {putline, "2."},
  231: 		    {getline, "2"},
  232: 		    {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  233: 		    {getline, "{binary,false}"},
  234: 		    {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  235: 		    {putline, "hej"},
  236: 		    {getline, "\"hej\\n\""},
  237: 		    {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  238: 		    {getline, "ok"},
  239: 		    {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  240: 		    {putline, "hej"},
  241: 		    {getline, "<<\"hej\\n\">>"}
  242: 		   ],[])
  243:     end,
  244:     %% And one with oldshell
  245:     rtnode([{putline,""},
  246: 	    {putline, "2."},
  247: 	    {getline_re, ".*2$"},
  248: 	    {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  249: 	    {getline_re, ".*{binary,false}"},
  250: 	    {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  251: 	    {putline, "hej"},
  252: 	    {getline_re, ".*\"hej\\\\n\""},
  253: 	    {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true}])."},
  254: 	    {getline_re, ".*ok"},
  255: 	    {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  256: 	    {putline, "hej"},
  257: 	    {getline_re, ".*<<\"hej\\\\n\">>"}
  258: 	   ],[],[],"-oldshell"),
  259:     ok.
  260: 
  261: 
  262: get_lc_ctype() ->
  263:     case {os:type(),os:version()} of
  264: 	{{unix,sunos},{5,N,_}} when N =< 8 ->
  265: 	    "iso_8859_1";
  266: 	_ ->
  267: 	    "ISO-8859-1"
  268:     end.
  269: 
  270: %% Test various unicode options.
  271: unicode_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  272:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  273:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  274:     %% A string in both russian and greek characters, which is present
  275:     %% in all the internal test files (but in different formats of course)...
  276:     TestData = [1090,1093,1077,32,1073,1080,1075,32,
  277: 		1088,1077,1076,32,1092,1086,1100,32,1093,
  278: 		1072,1089,32,1089,1086,1100,32,932,951,949,
  279: 		32,946,953,947,32,961,949,948,32,
  280: 		963,959,967,32,945,961,949,32,966,959,967,949,963],
  281:     %% Testdata from Chinese open source customer, that triggered OTP-7974
  282:     TestData2 = [46,46,46,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,
  283: 		 12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,
  284: 		 12411,12370,44,44,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,44,12411,12370,12411,
  285: 		 12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,12411,
  286: 		 12370,12411,12370,44,12411,12370,12411,12370,44,44,44,10],
  287: 
  288:     %% The external test files are generated with a BOM writing
  289:     %% text editor. A shorter line is written (with two characters 
  290:     %% larger than 127).
  291:     ExternalTestData = [197,116,101,114,101,114,246,118,114,97],
  292:     InternalBomFiles = ["testdata_utf8_bom.dat",
  293: 			"testdata_utf16_big_bom.dat",
  294: 			"testdata_utf16_little_bom.dat",
  295: 			"testdata_utf32_big_bom.dat",
  296: 			"testdata_utf32_little_bom.dat"],
  297:     AllNoBom = [{utf8,"testdata_utf8.dat"},
  298: 		{utf16,"testdata_utf16_big.dat"},
  299: 		{{utf16,big},"testdata_utf16_big.dat"},
  300: 		{{utf16,little},"testdata_utf16_little.dat"},
  301: 		{utf32,"testdata_utf32_big.dat"},
  302: 		{{utf32,big},"testdata_utf32_big.dat"},
  303: 		{{utf32,little},"testdata_utf32_little.dat"}],
  304:     ExternalBomFiles = ["external_utf8_bom.dat",
  305: 			"external_utf16_little_bom.dat",
  306: 			"external_utf16_big_bom.dat"],
  307:     ReadBomFile = fun(File,Dir) ->
  308: 			  {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  309: 					     [read,binary]),
  310: 			  {ok,Bin} = file:read(F,4),
  311: 			  {Type,Bytes} = unicode:bom_to_encoding(Bin),
  312: 			  file:position(F,Bytes),
  313: 			  io:setopts(F,[{encoding,Type}]),
  314: 			  R = unicode:characters_to_list(
  315: 				io:get_chars(F,'',length(TestData)),unicode),
  316: 			  file:close(F),
  317: 			  R
  318: 		  end,
  319:     ReadBomlessFile = fun({Type,File},DataLen,Dir) ->
  320: 			      {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  321: 						 [read,binary,
  322: 						  {encoding,Type}]),
  323: 			      R = unicode:characters_to_list(
  324: 				    io:get_chars(F,'',DataLen),unicode),
  325: 			      file:close(F),
  326: 			      R
  327: 		      end,
  328:     ReadBomlessFileList = fun({Type,File},DataLen,Dir) ->
  329: 				  {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  330: 						     [read,
  331: 						      {encoding,Type}]),
  332: 				  R = io:get_chars(F,'',DataLen),
  333: 				  file:close(F),
  334: 				  R
  335: 			  end,
  336:     ReadBomlessFileListLine = fun({Type,File},Dir) ->
  337: 				      {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  338: 							 [read,
  339: 							  {encoding,Type}]),
  340: 				      R = io:get_line(F,''),
  341: 				      file:close(F),
  342: 				      R
  343: 			      end,
  344:     [TestData = ReadBomFile(F,DataDir) || F <- InternalBomFiles ],
  345:     [ExternalTestData = ReadBomFile(F,DataDir) || F <- ExternalBomFiles ],
  346:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData),DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  347:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData),DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  348:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  349: 
  350:     BomDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"BOMDATA"]),
  351:     BomlessDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"BOMLESSDATA"]),
  352:     file:make_dir(BomDir),
  353:     file:make_dir(BomlessDir),
  354: 
  355:     WriteBomFile = fun({Enc,File},Dir) ->
  356: 			   {ok,F} = file:open(filename:join([Dir,File]),
  357: 					      [write,binary]),
  358: 			   file:write(F,unicode:encoding_to_bom(Enc)),
  359: 			   io:setopts(F,[{encoding,Enc}]),
  360: 			   io:put_chars(F,TestData),
  361: 			   file:close(F),
  362: 			   ok
  363: 		   end,
  364:     [ ok = WriteBomFile(F,BomDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  365:     [TestData = ReadBomFile(F,BomDir) || {_,F} <- AllNoBom ],
  366:     WriteBomlessFile = fun({Enc,File},TData,Dir) ->
  367: 			       {ok,F} = file:open(
  368: 					  filename:join([Dir,File]),
  369: 					  [write,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
  370: 			       io:put_chars(F,TData),
  371: 			       file:close(F),
  372: 			       ok
  373: 		       end,
  374:     [ ok = WriteBomlessFile(F,TestData,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  375:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  376:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  377:     [TestData = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  378: 
  379:     CannotReadFile = fun({Enc,File},Dir) ->
  380: 			     %%io:format(standard_error,"~s\r\n",[filename:join([Dir,File])]),
  381: 			     {ok,F} = file:open(
  382: 					filename:join([Dir,File]),
  383: 					[read,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
  384: 			     Enc2 = case Enc of
  385: 					utf8 ->
  386: 					    unicode;
  387: 					Tpl when is_tuple(Tpl) ->
  388: 					    Tpl;
  389: 					Atom when is_atom(Atom) ->
  390: 					    {Atom, big}
  391: 				    end,
  392: 			     {error, {no_translation,Enc2,latin1}} = 
  393: 				 file:read(F,10),
  394: 			     {error,terminated} = io:get_chars(F,'',10),
  395: 			     ok
  396: 		     end,
  397:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,DataDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  398:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  399:     [ ok = CannotReadFile(F,BomDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  400: 
  401:     [ ok = WriteBomlessFile(F,TestData2,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  402:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFile(F,length(TestData2),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  403:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFileList(F,length(TestData2),BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  404:     [TestData2 = ReadBomlessFileListLine(F,BomlessDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  405: 
  406: 
  407:     FailDir = filename:join([PrivDir,"FAIL"]),
  408:     file:make_dir(FailDir),
  409: 
  410:     CannotWriteFile = fun({_Enc,File},Dir) ->
  411: 			      {ok,F} = file:open(
  412: 					 filename:join([Dir,File]),
  413: 					 [write,binary]),
  414: 			      {'EXIT', {no_translation,_}} =
  415: 				  (catch io:put_chars(F,TestData)),
  416: 			      {'EXIT', {terminated,_}} = (catch io:put_chars(F,TestData)),
  417: 			      ok
  418: 		      end,
  419:     [ ok = CannotWriteFile(F,FailDir) || F <- AllNoBom ],
  420: 
  421:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  422: 	old ->
  423: 	    ok;
  424: 	new ->
  425: 	    %% OK, time for the group_leaders...
  426: 	    rtnode([{putline,""},
  427: 		    {putline, "2."},
  428: 		    {getline, "2"},
  429: 		    {putline, "lists:keyfind(encoding,1,io:getopts())."},
  430: 		    {getline, "{encoding,latin1}"},
  431: 		    {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  432: 		    {getline, "\\x{400}"},
  433: 		    {putline, "io:setopts([unicode])."},
  434: 		    {getline, "ok"},
  435: 		    {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  436: 		    {getline,
  437: 		     binary_to_list(unicode:characters_to_binary(
  438: 				      [1024],unicode,utf8))}
  439: 		   ],[],"LC_CTYPE=\""++get_lc_ctype()++"\"; "
  440: 		   "export LC_CTYPE; ")
  441:     end,
  442:     rtnode([{putline,""},
  443: 	    {putline, "2."},
  444: 	    {getline_re, ".*2$"},
  445: 	    {putline, "lists:keyfind(encoding,1,io:getopts())."},
  446: 	    {getline_re, ".*{encoding,latin1}"},
  447: 	    {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  448: 	    {getline_re, ".*\\\\x{400\\}"},
  449: 	    {putline, "io:setopts([{encoding,unicode}])."},
  450: 	    {getline_re, ".*ok"},
  451: 	    {putline, "io:format(\"~ts~n\",[[1024]])."},
  452: 	    {getline_re,
  453: 	     ".*"++binary_to_list(unicode:characters_to_binary(
  454: 				    [1024],unicode,utf8))}
  455: 	   ],[],"LC_CTYPE=\""++get_lc_ctype()++"\"; export LC_CTYPE; ",
  456: 	   " -oldshell "),
  457: 
  458:     ok.
  459: 
  460: %% Tests various unicode options on random generated files.
  461: unicode_options_gen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  462:     ct:timetrap({minutes,30}), %% valgrind needs a alot of time
  463:     rand:seed(default),
  464:     io:format("*** SEED: ~p ***\n", [rand:export_seed()]),
  465:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  466:     AllModes = [utf8,utf16,{utf16,big},{utf16,little},
  467: 		utf32,{utf32,big},{utf32,little}],
  468:     FSize = 9*1024,
  469:     NumItersRead = 2,
  470:     NumItersWrite = 2,
  471:     Dir = filename:join(PrivDir, "GENDATA1"),
  472:     file:make_dir(Dir),
  473: 
  474:     DoOneFile1 =
  475: 	fun(Encoding, N, M) ->
  476: 		?dbg({Encoding,M,N}),
  477: 		io:format("Read test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p~n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  478: 		io:format(standard_error,
  479: 			  "Read test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p\r\n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  480: 		Fname = filename:join(Dir,
  481: 				      "genfile_"++enc2str(Encoding)++
  482: 					  "_"++integer_to_list(N)),
  483: 		Ulist = random_unicode(FSize),
  484: 		Bin = unicode:characters_to_binary(Ulist, utf8, Encoding),
  485: 		ok = file:write_file(Fname, Bin),
  486: 
  487: 		Read1 = fun(FD) -> io:get_line(FD, '') end,
  488: 		Res1 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  489: 				       [read,read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  490: 				       Read1),
  491: 
  492: 		Read2 = fun(FD) -> io:get_chars(FD, '', M) end,
  493: 		Res2 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  494: 				       [read,binary,
  495: 					read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  496: 				       Read2),
  497: 
  498: 		Read3 = fun(FD) ->
  499: 				case io:fread(FD, '', "~ts") of
  500: 				    {ok,D} -> D;
  501: 				    Other -> Other end
  502: 			end,
  503: 		Res3 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  504: 				       [read,binary,
  505: 					read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  506: 				       Read3),
  507: 
  508: 		Read4 = fun(FD) ->
  509: 				case io:fread(FD, '', "~ts") of
  510: 				    {ok,D} -> D;
  511: 				    Other -> Other end
  512: 			end,
  513: 		Res4 = read_whole_file(Fname,
  514: 				       [read,read_ahead,{encoding,Encoding}],
  515: 				       Read4),
  516: 
  517: 		Ulist2 = [X || X <- Ulist, X =/= $\n, X =/= $\s, X =/= $\t],
  518: 		Ulist = done(Res1),
  519: 		Ulist = done(Res2),
  520: 		Ulist2 = done(Res3),
  521: 		Ulist2 = done(Res4),
  522: 
  523: 		file:delete(Fname)
  524: 	end,
  525:     [ [ [ DoOneFile1(E, N, M) || E <- AllModes ] ||
  526: 	  M <- [10,1000,128,1024,8192,8193] ] ||
  527: 	N <- lists:seq(1, NumItersRead) ],
  528: 
  529:     DoOneFile2 =
  530: 	fun(Encoding,N,M) ->
  531: 		?dbg({Encoding,M,N}),
  532: 		io:format("Write test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p~n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  533: 		io:format(standard_error,
  534: 			  "Write test: Encoding ~p, Chunk size ~p, Iteration ~p\r\n",[Encoding,M,N]),
  535: 		Fname = filename:join(Dir,
  536: 				      "genfile_"++enc2str(Encoding)++
  537: 					  "_"++integer_to_list(N)),
  538: 		Ulist = random_unicode(FSize),
  539: 
  540: 		Res1 = write_read_file(Fname, 1,
  541: 				       [write],
  542: 				       Encoding,
  543: 				       fun(FD) -> io:put_chars(FD, Ulist) end),
  544: 
  545: 		Res2 = write_read_file(Fname, 2,
  546: 				       [write,binary],
  547: 				       Encoding,
  548: 				       fun(FD) -> io:put_chars(FD, Ulist) end),
  549: 
  550: 		Fun3 = fun(FD) ->
  551: 			       _ = [io:format(FD, "~tc", [C]) || C <- Ulist],
  552: 			       ok
  553: 		       end,
  554: 		Res3 = write_read_file(Fname, 3,
  555: 				       [write],
  556: 				       Encoding,
  557: 				       Fun3),
  558: 
  559: 		Fun4 = fun(FD) ->
  560: 			       io:put_chars(FD,
  561: 					    unicode:characters_to_binary(Ulist))
  562: 		       end,
  563: 		Res4 = write_read_file(Fname, 4,
  564: 				       [write],
  565: 				       Encoding,
  566: 				       Fun4),
  567: 
  568: 		LL = string:tokens(Ulist, "\n"),
  569: 		Fun5 = fun(FD) ->
  570: 			       _ = [io:format(FD, "~ts", [L]) || L <- LL],
  571: 			       ok
  572: 		       end,
  573: 		Res5 = write_read_file(Fname, 5,
  574: 				       [write],
  575: 				       Encoding,
  576: 				       Fun5),
  577: 
  578: 		Ulist2 = lists:flatten(LL),
  579: 		ResBin = done(Res1),
  580: 		ResBin = done(Res2),
  581: 		ResBin = done(Res3),
  582: 		ResBin = done(Res4),
  583: 		Ulist = unicode:characters_to_list(ResBin, Encoding),
  584: 
  585: 		ResBin2 = done(Res5),
  586: 		Ulist2 = unicode:characters_to_list(ResBin2, Encoding),
  587: 
  588: 		ok
  589: 	end,
  590:     [ [ [ DoOneFile2(E, N, M) || E <- AllModes ] ||
  591: 	  M <- [10,1000,128,1024,8192,8193] ] ||
  592: 	N <- lists:seq(1, NumItersWrite) ],
  593:     ok.
  594: 
  595: read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun) ->
  596:     do(fun() ->
  597: 	       do_read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun)
  598:        end).
  599: 
  600: do_read_whole_file(Fname, Options, Fun) ->
  601:     {ok,F} = file:open(Fname, Options),
  602:     Res = do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F),
  603:     ok = file:close(F),
  604:     unicode:characters_to_list(Res, unicode).
  605: 
  606: do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F) ->
  607:     case Fun(F) of
  608: 	eof ->
  609: 	    [];
  610: 	{error,Error} ->
  611: 	    receive after 10000 -> ok end,
  612: 	    exit(Error);
  613: 	Other ->
  614: 	    [Other|do_read_whole_file_1(Fun, F)]
  615:     end.
  616: 
  617: write_read_file(Fname0, N, Options, Enc, Writer) ->
  618:     Fname = Fname0 ++ "_" ++ integer_to_list(N),
  619:     do(fun() ->
  620: 	       do_write_read_file(Fname, Options, Enc, Writer)
  621:        end).
  622: 
  623: do_write_read_file(Fname, Options, Encoding, Writer) ->
  624:     {ok,F} = file:open(Fname, [{encoding,Encoding}|Options]),
  625:     Writer(F),
  626:     ok = file:close(F),
  627:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(Fname),
  628:     ok = file:delete(Fname),
  629:     Bin.
  630: 
  631: enc2str(Atom) when is_atom(Atom) ->
  632:     atom_to_list(Atom);
  633: enc2str({A1,A2}) when is_atom(A1), is_atom(A2) ->
  634:     atom_to_list(A1)++"_"++atom_to_list(A2).
  635: 
  636: 
  637: random_unicode(0) ->
  638:     %% io:fread(Device, Promp, "~ts") will return an error if the file
  639:     %% ends with whitespace characters. This behavior seems to be
  640:     %% deliberate. Therefore, be sure that we never end the file with
  641:     %% a sequence of whitespace characters.
  642:     [$! + rand:uniform(64) |
  643:      case rand:uniform(20) of
  644:          A when A =< 1 -> [$\n];
  645:          _ -> []
  646:      end];
  647: random_unicode(N) ->
  648:     %% Favor large unicode code points and make line breaks.
  649:     X = case rand:uniform(20) of
  650: 	    A when A =< 1 -> $\n;
  651: 	    A when A =< 3 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF);
  652: 	    A when A =< 6 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#7F) + 16#7F;
  653: 	    A when A =< 12 -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#7FF) + 16#7FF;
  654: 	    _ -> rand:uniform(16#10FFFF - 16#FFFF) + 16#FFFF
  655: 	end,
  656:     if
  657:         X =:= $\r;                            %Can be eaten by io:get_line/2.
  658:         16#D800 =< X, X =< 16#DFFF;
  659:         X =:= 16#FFFE;
  660:         X =:= 16#FFFF ->
  661: 	    random_unicode(N);
  662: 	true ->
  663: 	    [X | random_unicode(N-1)]
  664:     end.
  665: 
  666: 
  667: %% Test variants with binary option.
  668: binary_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  669:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
  670:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  671:     TestData = unicode:characters_to_binary(
  672: 		 [1090,1093,1077,32,1073,1080,1075,32,
  673: 		  1088,1077,1076,32,1092,1086,1100,32,1093,
  674: 		  1072,1089,32,1089,1086,1100,32,932,951,949,
  675: 		  32,946,953,947,32,961,949,948,32,
  676: 		  963,959,967,32,945,961,949,32,966,959,967,949,963]),
  677:     <<First10:10/binary,Second10:10/binary,_/binary>> = TestData,
  678:     First10List = binary_to_list(First10),
  679:     Second10List = binary_to_list(Second10),
  680:     TestFile = filename:join([DataDir, "testdata_utf8.dat"]),
  681:     {ok, F} = file:open(TestFile,[read]),
  682:     {ok, First10List} = file:read(F,10),
  683:     io:setopts(F,[binary]),
  684:     {ok, Second10} = file:read(F,10),
  685:     file:close(F),
  686:     {ok, F2} = file:open(TestFile,[read,binary]),
  687:     {ok, First10} = file:read(F2,10),
  688:     io:setopts(F2,[list]),
  689:     {ok, Second10List} = file:read(F2,10),
  690:     file:position(F2,0),
  691:     First10List = io:get_chars(F2,'',10),
  692:     io:setopts(F2,[binary]),
  693:     Second10 = unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_chars(F2,'',10),unicode,latin1),
  694:     file:close(F2),
  695:     LineBreakFileName =  filename:join([PrivDir, "testdata.dat"]),
  696:     LineBreakTestData = <<TestData/binary,$\n>>,
  697:     LineBreakTestDataList = binary_to_list(LineBreakTestData),
  698:     file:write_file(LineBreakFileName,[LineBreakTestData,LineBreakTestData,LineBreakTestData,TestData]),
  699:     {ok, F3} = file:open(LineBreakFileName,[read]),
  700:     LineBreakTestDataList = io:get_line(F3,''),
  701:     io:setopts(F3,[binary]),
  702:     LineBreakTestData =  unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_line(F3,''),unicode,latin1),
  703:     io:setopts(F3,[list]),
  704:     LineBreakTestDataList = io:get_line(F3,''),
  705:     io:setopts(F3,[binary]),
  706:     TestData = unicode:characters_to_binary(io:get_line(F3,''),unicode,latin1),
  707:     eof = io:get_line(F3,''),
  708:     file:close(F3),
  709: 
  710:     %% OK, time for the group_leaders...
  711:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config) of
  712: 	old ->
  713: 	    ok;
  714: 	new ->
  715: 	    rtnode([{putline, "2."},
  716: 		    {getline, "2"},
  717: 		    {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  718: 		    {getline, "{binary,false}"},
  719: 		    {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  720: 		    {putline, "hej"},
  721: 		    {getline, "\"hej\\n\""},
  722: 		    {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true},unicode])."},
  723: 		    {getline, "ok"},
  724: 		    {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  725: 		    {putline, "hej"},
  726: 		    {getline, "<<\"hej\\n\">>"},
  727: 		    {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  728: 		    {putline, binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)},
  729: 		    {getline, "<<\""++binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)++"\\n\"/utf8>>"}
  730: 		   ],[])
  731:     end,
  732:     %% And one with oldshell
  733:     rtnode([{putline, "2."},
  734: 	    {getline_re, ".*2$"},
  735: 	    {putline, "lists:keyfind(binary,1,io:getopts())."},
  736: 	    {getline_re, ".*{binary,false}"},
  737: 	    {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  738: 	    {putline, "hej"},
  739: 	    {getline_re, ".*\"hej\\\\n\""},
  740: 	    {putline, "io:setopts([{binary,true},unicode])."},
  741: 	    {getline_re, ".*ok"},
  742: 	    {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  743: 	    {putline, "hej"},
  744: 	    {getline_re, ".*<<\"hej\\\\n\">>"},
  745: 	    {putline, "io:get_line('')."},
  746: 	    {putline, binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)},
  747: 	    {getline_re, ".*<<\""++binary_to_list(<<"\345\344\366"/utf8>>)++"\\\\n\"/utf8>>"}
  748: 	   ],[],[],"-oldshell"),
  749:     ok.
  750:

  754: answering_machine1(OthNode,OthReg,Me) ->
  755:     TestDataLine1 = [229,228,246],
  756:     TestDataUtf = binary_to_list(unicode:characters_to_binary(TestDataLine1)),
  757:     rtnode([{putline,""},
  758: 	    {putline, "2."},
  759: 	    {getline, "2"},
  760: 	    {putline, "{"++OthReg++","++OthNode++"} ! group_leader()."},
  761: 	    {getline, "<"},
  762: 	    %% get_line
  763: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  764: 	    {putline, "Hej"},
  765: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  766: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  767: 	    {putline, "Hej"},
  768: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  769: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  770: 	    {putline, TestDataLine1},
  771: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  772: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  773: 	    {putline, TestDataLine1},
  774: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  775: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  776: 	    {putline, TestDataUtf},
  777: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  778: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  779: 	    {putline, TestDataUtf},
  780: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  781: 	    %% get_chars
  782: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  783: 	    {putline, "Hej"},
  784: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  785: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  786: 	    {putline, "Hej"},
  787: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  788: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  789: 	    {putline, TestDataLine1},
  790: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  791: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  792: 	    {putline, TestDataLine1},
  793: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  794: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  795: 	    {putline, TestDataUtf},
  796: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  797: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  798: 	    {putline, TestDataUtf},
  799: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  800: 	    %% fread
  801: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  802: 	    {putline, "Hej"},
  803: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  804: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  805: 	    {putline, "Hej"},
  806: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  807: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  808: 	    {putline, TestDataLine1},
  809: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  810: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  811: 	    {putline, TestDataLine1},
  812: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  813: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  814: 	    {putline, TestDataUtf},
  815: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  816: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  817: 	    {putline, TestDataUtf},
  818: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"}
  819: 
  820: 	   ],Me,"LC_CTYPE=\""++get_lc_ctype()++"\"; export LC_CTYPE; "),
  821:     O = list_to_atom(OthReg),
  822:     O ! {self(),done},
  823:     ok.
  824: 
  825: answering_machine2(OthNode,OthReg,Me) ->
  826:     TestDataLine1 = [229,228,246],
  827:     TestDataUtf = binary_to_list(unicode:characters_to_binary(TestDataLine1)),
  828:     rtnode([{putline,""},
  829: 	    {putline, "2."},
  830: 	    {getline, "2"},
  831: 	    {putline, "{"++OthReg++","++OthNode++"} ! group_leader()."},
  832: 	    {getline_re, ".*<[0-9].*"},
  833: 	    %% get_line
  834: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  835: 	    {putline, "Hej"},
  836: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  837: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  838: 	    {putline, "Hej"},
  839: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},

  848: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  849: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  850: 	    {putline, TestDataUtf},
  851: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  852: 	    %% get_chars

  854: 	    {putline, "Hej"},
  855: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  856: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  857: 	    {putline, "Hej"},
  858: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},

  864: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},

  866: 	    {putline, TestDataUtf},
  867: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  868: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  869: 	    {putline, TestDataUtf},
  870: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  871: 	    %% fread
  872: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  873: 	    {putline, "Hej"},
  874: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  875: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  876: 	    {putline, "Hej"},
  877: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  878: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  879: 	    {putline, TestDataLine1},
  880: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  881: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  882: 	    {putline, TestDataLine1},
  883: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  884: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  885: 	    {putline, TestDataUtf},
  886: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"},
  887: 	    {getline_re, ".*Prompt"},
  888: 	    {putline, TestDataUtf},
  889: 	    {getline_re, ".*Okej"}
  890: 
  891: 	   ],Me,"LC_CTYPE=\""++get_lc_ctype()++"\"; export LC_CTYPE; "," -oldshell "),
  892:     O = list_to_atom(OthReg),
  893:     O ! {self(),done},
  894:     ok.

  896: 
  897: %% Test various modes when reading from the group leade from another machine.
  898: read_modes_ogl(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  899:     case get_progs() of
  900: 	{error,Reason} ->
  901: 	    {skipped,Reason};
  902: 	_ ->
  903: 	    read_modes_gl_1(Config,answering_machine2)
  904:     end.
  905: 
  906: %% Test various modes when reading from the group leade from another machine.
  907: read_modes_gl(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  908:     case {get_progs(),proplists:get_value(default_shell,Config)} of
  909: 	{{error,Reason},_} ->
  910: 	    {skipped,Reason};
  911: 	{_,old} ->
  912: 	    {skipper,"No new shell"};
  913: 	_ ->
  914: 	    read_modes_gl_1(Config,answering_machine1)
  915:     end.
  916: 
  917: read_modes_gl_1(_Config,Machine) ->
  918:     TestDataLine1 = [229,228,246],
  919:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = unicode:characters_to_binary(TestDataLine1),
  920:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = list_to_binary(TestDataLine1),
  921: 
  922:     {ok,N2List} = create_nodename(),
  923:     MyNodeList = atom2list(node()),
  924:     register(io_proto_suite,self()),
  925:     AM1 = spawn(?MODULE,Machine,
  926: 		[MyNodeList, "io_proto_suite", N2List]),
  927: 
  928:     GL = receive X when is_pid(X) -> X end,
  929:     ?dbg({group_leader,X}),
  930:     %% get_line
  931:     receive after 500 -> ok end, % Dont clash with the new shell...
  932:     "Hej\n" = io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n"),
  933:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
  934:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  935:     <<"Hej\n">> = io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n"),
  936:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
  937:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  938:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = chomp(io:request(GL,{get_line,latin1,"Prompt\n"})),
  939:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  940:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = chomp(io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n")),
  941:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  942: 
  943:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  944:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = chomp(io:request(GL,{get_line,latin1,"Prompt\n"})),
  945:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  946:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = chomp(io:get_line(GL,"Prompt\n")),
  947:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
  948:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  949: 
  950:     %%get_chars
  951:     "Hej" = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
  952:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
  953:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  954:     <<"Hej">> = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
  955:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
  956:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  957:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = io:request(GL,{get_chars,latin1,"Prompt\n",3}),
  958:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  959:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
  960:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  961: 
  962:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  963:     TestDataLine1BinLatin = io:request(GL,{get_chars,latin1,"Prompt\n",3}),
  964:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  965:     TestDataLine1BinUtf = io:get_chars(GL,"Prompt\n",3),
  966:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
  967:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  968:     %%fread
  969:     {ok,["Hej"]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
  970:     io:setopts(GL,[binary]),
  971:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  972:     {ok,["Hej"]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
  973:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,latin1}]),
  974:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  975:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
  976:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  977:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
  978:     io:setopts(GL,[{encoding,unicode}]),
  979:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  980:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
  981:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  982:     {ok,[TestDataLine1]} = io:fread(GL,"Prompt\n","~s"),
  983:     io:setopts(GL,[list]),
  984:     io:format(GL,"Okej~n",[]),
  985: 
  986: 
  987:     receive
  988: 	{AM1,done} ->
  989: 	    ok
  990:     after 5000 ->
  991: 	    exit(timeout)
  992:     end,
  993:     ok.
  994: 
  995: 
  996: %% Test behaviour when reading broken Unicode files
  997: broken_unicode(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  998:     Dir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  999:     Latin1Name = filename:join([Dir,"latin1_data_file.dat"]),
 1000:     Utf8Name = filename:join([Dir,"utf8_data_file.dat"]),
 1001:     Latin1Data = iolist_to_binary(lists:duplicate(10,lists:seq(0,255)++[255,255,255])),
 1002:     Utf8Data = unicode:characters_to_binary(
 1003: 		 lists:duplicate(10,lists:seq(0,255))),
 1004:     file:write_file(Latin1Name,Latin1Data),
 1005:     file:write_file(Utf8Name,Utf8Data),
 1006:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf8) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1007:     [ utf8 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Utf8Name,N,utf8) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1008:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf16) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1009:     [ latin1 = heuristic_encoding_file2(Latin1Name,N,utf32) || N <- lists:seq(1,100)++[1024,2048,10000]],
 1010:     ok.
 1011: 
 1012: 
 1013: %%
 1014: %% From the cookbook, more or less
 1015: heuristic_encoding_file2(FileName,Chunk,Enc) ->
 1016:     {ok,F} = file:open(FileName,[read,binary,{encoding,Enc}]),
 1017:     loop_through_file2(F,io:get_chars(F,'',Chunk),Chunk,Enc).
 1018: 
 1019: loop_through_file2(_,eof,_,Enc) ->
 1020:     Enc;
 1021: loop_through_file2(_,{error,_Err},_,_) ->
 1022:     latin1;
 1023: loop_through_file2(F,Bin,Chunk,Enc) when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1024:     loop_through_file2(F,io:get_chars(F,'',Chunk),Chunk,Enc).
 1025: 
 1026: 
 1027: 
 1028: %% Test eof before newline on stdin when erlang is in pipe.
 1029: eof_on_pipe(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1030:     case {get_progs(),os:type()} of
 1031: 	{{error,Reason},_} ->
 1032: 	    {skipped,Reason};
 1033: 	{{_,_,Erl},{unix,linux}} -> 
 1034: 	    %% Not even Linux is reliable - echo can be both styles
 1035: 	    try
 1036: 		EchoLine = case os:cmd("echo -ne \"test\\ntest\"") of
 1037: 			       "test\ntest" ->
 1038: 				   "echo -ne \"a\\nbu\" | ";
 1039: 			       _ ->
 1040: 				   case os:cmd("echo \"test\\ntest\\c\"") of
 1041: 				       "test\ntest" ->
 1042: 					   "echo \"a\\nbu\\c\" | ";
 1043: 				       _ ->
 1044: 					   throw(skip)
 1045: 				   end
 1046: 			   end,
 1047: 		CommandLine1 = EchoLine ++
 1048: 		    "\""++Erl++"\" -noshell -eval  "
 1049: 		    "'io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1050: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1051: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]).' -run init stop",
 1052: 		case os:cmd(CommandLine1) of
 1053: 		    "\"a\\n\"\"bu\"eof" ->
 1054: 			ok;
 1055: 		    Other1 ->
 1056: 			exit({unexpected1,Other1})
 1057: 		end,
 1058: 		CommandLine2 = EchoLine ++
 1059: 		    "\""++Erl++"\" -noshell -eval  "
 1060: 		    "'io:setopts([binary]),io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1061: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]),"
 1062: 		    "io:format(\"~p\",[io:get_line(\"\")]).' -run init stop",
 1063: 		case os:cmd(CommandLine2) of
 1064: 		    "<<\"a\\n\">><<\"bu\">>eof" ->
 1065: 			ok;
 1066: 		    Other2 ->
 1067: 			exit({unexpected2,Other2})
 1068: 		end
 1069: 	    catch
 1070: 		throw:skip ->
 1071: 		    {skipped,"unsupported echo program"}
 1072: 	    end;
 1073: 	{_,_} ->
 1074: 	    {skipped,"Only on linux"}
 1075:     end.
 1076: 
 1077: 
 1078: %%
 1079: %% Tool for running interactive shell (stolen from the kernel
 1080: %% test suite interactive_shell_SUITE)
 1081: %%
 1082: -undef(line).
 1083: -define(line,).
 1084: rtnode(C,N) ->
 1085:     rtnode(C,N,[]).
 1086: rtnode(Commands,Nodename,ErlPrefix) ->
 1087:     rtnode(Commands,Nodename,ErlPrefix,[]).
 1088: rtnode(Commands,Nodename,ErlPrefix,Extra) ->
 1089:     case get_progs() of
 1090: 	{error,_Reason} ->
 1091: 	    {skip,"No runerl present"};
 1092: 	{RunErl,ToErl,Erl} ->
 1093: 	    case create_tempdir() of
 1094: 		{error, Reason2} ->
 1095: 		    {skip, Reason2};
 1096: 		Tempdir ->
 1097: 		    SPid = start_runerl_node(RunErl, ErlPrefix++
 1098: 						 "\\\""++Erl++"\\\"",
 1099: 					     Tempdir, Nodename, Extra),
 1100: 		    CPid = start_toerl_server(ToErl, Tempdir),
 1101: 		    put(getline_skipped, []),
 1102: 		    Res = (catch get_and_put(CPid, Commands, 1)),
 1103: 		    case stop_runerl_node(CPid) of
 1104: 			{error,_} ->
 1105: 			    CPid2 = start_toerl_server(ToErl, Tempdir),
 1106: 			    put(getline_skipped, []),
 1107: 			    ok = get_and_put
 1108: 				   (CPid2,
 1109: 				    [{putline,[7]},
 1110: 				     {sleep,
 1111: 				      timeout(short)},
 1112: 				     {putline,""},
 1113: 				     {getline," -->"},
 1114: 				     {putline,"s"},
 1115: 				     {putline,"c"},
 1116: 				     {putline,""}], 1),
 1117: 			    stop_runerl_node(CPid2);
 1118: 			_ ->
 1119: 			    ok
 1120: 		    end,
 1121: 		    wait_for_runerl_server(SPid),
 1122: 		    ok = ?RM_RF(Tempdir),
 1123: 		    ok = Res
 1124: 	    end
 1125:     end.
 1126: 
 1127: timeout(long) ->
 1128:     2 * timeout(normal);
 1129: timeout(short) ->
 1130:     timeout(normal) div 10;
 1131: timeout(normal) ->
 1132:     10000 * test_server:timetrap_scale_factor().
 1133: 
 1134: 
 1135: %% start_noshell_node(Name) ->
 1136: %%     PADir =  filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1137: %%     {ok, Node} = test_server:start_node(Name,slave,[{args," -noshell -pa "++
 1138: %% 						     PADir++" "}]),
 1139: %%     Node.
 1140: %% stop_noshell_node(Node) ->
 1141: %%     test_server:stop_node(Node).
 1142: 
 1143: -ifndef(debug).
 1144: rm_rf(Dir) ->
 1145:     try
 1146: 	{ok,List} = file:list_dir(Dir),
 1147: 	Files = [filename:join([Dir,X]) || X <- List],
 1148: 	[case file:list_dir(Y) of
 1149: 	     {error, enotdir} ->
 1150: 		 ok = file:delete(Y);
 1151: 	     _ ->
 1152: 		 ok = rm_rf(Y)
 1153: 	 end || Y <- Files],
 1154: 	ok = file:del_dir(Dir),
 1155: 	ok
 1156:     catch
 1157: 	_:Exception -> {error, {Exception,Dir}}
 1158:     end.
 1159: -endif.       
 1160: 
 1161: get_and_put(_CPid,[],_) ->
 1162:     ok;
 1163: get_and_put(CPid, [{sleep, X}|T],N) ->
 1164:     ?dbg({sleep, X}),
 1165:     receive
 1166:     after X ->
 1167: 	    get_and_put(CPid,T,N+1)
 1168:     end;
 1169: get_and_put(CPid, [{getline_pred,Pred,Msg}|T]=T0, N)
 1170:   when is_function(Pred) ->
 1171:     ?dbg({getline, Match}),
 1172:     CPid ! {self(), {get_line, timeout(normal)}},
 1173:     receive
 1174: 	{get_line, timeout} ->
 1175: 	    error_logger:error_msg("~p: getline timeout waiting for \"~s\" "
 1176: 				   "(command number ~p, skipped: ~p)~n",
 1177: 				   [?MODULE,Msg,N,get(getline_skipped)]),
 1178: 	    {error, timeout};
 1179: 	{get_line, Data} ->
 1180: 	    ?dbg({data,Data}),
 1181: 	    case Pred(Data) of
 1182: 		yes ->
 1183: 		    put(getline_skipped, []),
 1184: 		    get_and_put(CPid, T,N+1);
 1185: 		no ->
 1186: 		    error_logger:error_msg("~p: getline match failure "
 1187: 					   "\"~s\" "
 1188: 					   "(command number ~p)\n",
 1189: 					   [?MODULE,Msg,N]),
 1190: 		    {error, no_match};
 1191: 		'maybe' ->
 1192: 		    List = get(getline_skipped),
 1193: 		    put(getline_skipped, List ++ [Data]),
 1194: 		    get_and_put(CPid, T0, N)
 1195: 	    end
 1196:     end;
 1197: get_and_put(CPid, [{getline, Match}|T],N) ->
 1198:     ?dbg({getline, Match}),
 1199:     F = fun(Data) ->
 1200: 		case lists:prefix(Match, Data) of
 1201: 		    true -> yes;
 1202: 		    false -> 'maybe'
 1203: 		end
 1204: 	end,
 1205:     get_and_put(CPid, [{getline_pred,F,Match}|T], N);
 1206: get_and_put(CPid, [{getline_re, Match}|T],N) ->
 1207:     F = fun(Data) ->
 1208: 		case re:run(Data, Match, [{capture,none}]) of
 1209: 		    match -> yes;
 1210: 		    _ -> 'maybe'
 1211: 		end
 1212: 	end,
 1213:     get_and_put(CPid, [{getline_pred,F,Match}|T], N);
 1214: get_and_put(CPid, [{putline_raw, Line}|T],N) ->
 1215:     ?dbg({putline_raw, Line}),
 1216:     CPid ! {self(), {send_line, Line}},
 1217:     Timeout = timeout(normal),
 1218:     receive
 1219: 	{send_line, ok} ->
 1220: 	    get_and_put(CPid, T,N+1)
 1221:     after Timeout ->
 1222: 	    error_logger:error_msg("~p: putline_raw timeout (~p) sending "
 1223: 				   "\"~s\" (command number ~p)~n",
 1224: 				   [?MODULE, Timeout, Line, N]),
 1225: 	    {error, timeout}
 1226:     end;
 1227: 
 1228: get_and_put(CPid, [{putline, Line}|T],N) ->
 1229:     ?dbg({putline, Line}),
 1230:     CPid ! {self(), {send_line, Line}},
 1231:     Timeout = timeout(normal),
 1232:     receive
 1233: 	{send_line, ok} ->
 1234: 	    get_and_put(CPid, [{getline, []}|T],N)
 1235:     after Timeout ->
 1236: 	    error_logger:error_msg("~p: putline timeout (~p) sending "
 1237: 				   "\"~s\" (command number ~p)~n[~p]~n",
 1238: 				   [?MODULE, Timeout, Line, N,get()]),
 1239: 	    {error, timeout}
 1240:     end.
 1241: 
 1242: wait_for_runerl_server(SPid) ->
 1243:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, SPid), 
 1244:     Timeout = timeout(long),
 1245:     receive
 1246: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, SPid, _} ->
 1247: 	    ok
 1248:     after Timeout ->
 1249: 	    {error, timeout}
 1250:     end.
 1251: 
 1252: 
 1253: 
 1254: stop_runerl_node(CPid) ->
 1255:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, CPid),
 1256:     CPid ! {self(), kill_emulator},
 1257:     Timeout = timeout(long),
 1258:     receive
 1259: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, CPid, noproc} ->
 1260: 	    ok;
 1261: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, CPid, normal} ->
 1262: 	    ok;
 1263: 	{'DOWN', Ref, process, CPid, {error, Reason}} ->
 1264: 	    {error, Reason}
 1265:     after Timeout ->
 1266: 	    {error, timeout}
 1267:     end.
 1268: 
 1269: get_progs() ->
 1270:     case os:type() of
 1271: 	{unix,freebsd} ->
 1272: 	    {error,"cant use run_erl on freebsd"};
 1273: 	{unix,openbsd} ->
 1274: 	    {error,"cant use run_erl on openbsd"};
 1275: 	{unix,_} ->
 1276: 	    case os:find_executable("run_erl") of
 1277: 		RE when is_list(RE) ->
 1278: 		    case  os:find_executable("to_erl") of
 1279: 			TE when is_list(TE) ->
 1280: 			    case os:find_executable("erl") of
 1281: 				E when is_list(E) ->
 1282: 				    {RE,TE,E};
 1283: 				_ ->
 1284: 				    {error, "Could not find erl command"}
 1285: 			    end;
 1286: 			_ ->
 1287: 			    {error, "Could not find to_erl command"}
 1288: 		    end;
 1289: 		_ ->
 1290: 		    {error, "Could not find run_erl command"}
 1291: 	    end;
 1292: 	_ ->
 1293: 	    {error, "Not a unix OS"}
 1294:     end.
 1295: 
 1296: create_tempdir() ->
 1297:     create_tempdir(filename:join(["/tmp","rtnode"++os:getpid()]),$A).
 1298: 
 1299: create_tempdir(Dir,X) when X > $Z, X < $a ->
 1300:     create_tempdir(Dir,$a);
 1301: create_tempdir(Dir,X) when X > $z -> 
 1302:     Estr = lists:flatten(
 1303: 	     io_lib:format("Unable to create ~s, reason eexist",
 1304: 			   [Dir++[$z]])),
 1305:     {error, Estr};
 1306: create_tempdir(Dir0, Ch) ->
 1307:     %% Expect fairly standard unix.
 1308:     Dir = Dir0++[Ch],
 1309:     case file:make_dir(Dir) of
 1310: 	{error, eexist} ->
 1311: 	    create_tempdir(Dir0, Ch+1);
 1312: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1313: 	    Estr = lists:flatten(
 1314: 		     io_lib:format("Unable to create ~s, reason ~p",
 1315: 				   [Dir,Reason])),
 1316: 	    {error,Estr};
 1317: 	ok ->
 1318: 	    Dir
 1319:     end.
 1320: 
 1321: create_nodename() ->
 1322:     create_nodename($A).
 1323: 
 1324: create_nodename(X) when X > $Z, X < $a ->
 1325:     create_nodename($a);
 1326: create_nodename(X) when X > $z -> 
 1327:     {error,out_of_nodenames};
 1328: create_nodename(X) ->
 1329:     NN = "rtnode"++os:getpid()++[X],
 1330:     case file:read_file_info(filename:join(["/tmp",NN])) of
 1331: 	{error,enoent} ->
 1332: 	    Host = lists:nth(2,string:tokens(atom_to_list(node()),"@")),
 1333: 	    {ok,NN++"@"++Host};
 1334: 	_ ->
 1335: 	    create_nodename(X+1)
 1336:     end.
 1337: 
 1338: 
 1339: start_runerl_node(RunErl,Erl,Tempdir,Nodename,Extra) ->
 1340:     XArg = case Nodename of
 1341: 	       [] ->
 1342: 		   [];
 1343: 	       _ ->
 1344: 		   " -sname "++(if is_atom(Nodename) -> atom_to_list(Nodename);
 1345: 				   true -> Nodename
 1346: 				end)++
 1347: 		       " -setcookie "++atom_to_list(erlang:get_cookie())
 1348: 	   end,
 1349:     XXArg = case Extra of
 1350: 		[] ->
 1351: 		    [];
 1352: 		_ ->
 1353: 		    " "++Extra
 1354: 	    end,
 1355:     spawn(fun() ->
 1356: 		  ?dbg("\""++RunErl++"\" "++Tempdir++"/ "++Tempdir++
 1357: 			   " \""++Erl++XArg++XXArg++"\""),
 1358: 		  os:cmd("\""++RunErl++"\" "++Tempdir++"/ "++Tempdir++
 1359: 			     " \""++Erl++XArg++XXArg++"\"")
 1360: 	  end).
 1361: 
 1362: start_toerl_server(ToErl,Tempdir) ->
 1363:     Pid = spawn(?MODULE,toerl_server,[self(),ToErl,Tempdir]),
 1364:     receive
 1365: 	{Pid,started} ->
 1366: 	    Pid;
 1367: 	{Pid,error,Reason} ->
 1368: 	    {error,Reason}
 1369:     end.
 1370: 
 1371: try_to_erl(_Command, 0) ->
 1372:     {error, cannot_to_erl};
 1373: try_to_erl(Command, N) ->
 1374:     ?dbg({?LINE,N}),
 1375:     Port = open_port({spawn, Command},[eof,{line,1000}]),
 1376:     Timeout = timeout(normal) div 2,
 1377:     receive
 1378: 	{Port, eof} -> 	
 1379: 	    receive after Timeout ->
 1380: 			    ok
 1381: 		    end,
 1382: 	    try_to_erl(Command, N-1)
 1383:     after Timeout ->
 1384: 	    ?dbg(Port),
 1385: 	    Port
 1386:     end.
 1387: 
 1388: toerl_server(Parent,ToErl,Tempdir) ->
 1389:     Port = try_to_erl("\""++ToErl++"\" "++Tempdir++"/ 2>/dev/null",8),
 1390:     case Port of
 1391: 	P when is_port(P) ->
 1392: 	    Parent ! {self(),started};
 1393: 	{error,Other} ->
 1394: 	    Parent ! {self(),error,Other},
 1395: 	    exit(Other)
 1396:     end,
 1397:     case toerl_loop(Port,[]) of
 1398: 	normal ->
 1399: 	    ok;
 1400: 	{error, Reason} ->
 1401: 	    error_logger:error_msg("toerl_server exit with reason ~p~n",
 1402: 				   [Reason]),
 1403: 	    exit(Reason)
 1404:     end.
 1405: 
 1406: toerl_loop(Port,Acc) ->
 1407:     ?dbg({toerl_loop, Port, Acc}),
 1408:     receive
 1409: 	{Port,{data,{Tag0,Data}}} when is_port(Port) ->
 1410: 	    ?dbg({?LINE,Port,{data,{Tag0,Data}}}),
 1411: 	    case Acc of
 1412: 		[{noeol,Data0}|T0] ->
 1413: 		    toerl_loop(Port,[{Tag0, Data0++Data}|T0]);
 1414: 		_ ->
 1415: 		    toerl_loop(Port,[{Tag0,Data}|Acc])
 1416: 	    end;
 1417: 	{Pid,{get_line,Timeout}} ->
 1418: 	    case Acc of
 1419: 		[] ->
 1420: 		    case get_data_within(Port,Timeout,[]) of
 1421: 			timeout ->
 1422: 			    Pid ! {get_line, timeout},
 1423: 			    toerl_loop(Port,[]);
 1424: 			{noeol,Data1} ->
 1425: 			    Pid ! {get_line, timeout},
 1426: 			    toerl_loop(Port,[{noeol,Data1}]);
 1427: 			{eol,Data2} ->
 1428: 			    Pid ! {get_line, Data2}, 
 1429: 			    toerl_loop(Port,[])
 1430: 		    end;
 1431: 		[{noeol,Data3}] ->
 1432: 		    case get_data_within(Port,Timeout,Data3) of
 1433: 			timeout ->
 1434: 			    Pid ! {get_line, timeout},
 1435: 			    toerl_loop(Port,Acc);
 1436: 			{noeol,Data4} ->
 1437: 			    Pid ! {get_line, timeout},
 1438: 			    toerl_loop(Port,[{noeol,Data4}]);
 1439: 			{eol,Data5} ->
 1440: 			    Pid ! {get_line, Data5},
 1441: 			    toerl_loop(Port,[])
 1442: 		    end;
 1443: 		List ->
 1444: 		    {NewAcc,[{eol,Data6}]} = lists:split(length(List)-1,List),
 1445: 		    Pid ! {get_line,Data6},
 1446: 		    toerl_loop(Port,NewAcc)
 1447: 	    end;
 1448: 	{Pid, {send_line, Data7}} ->
 1449: 	    Port ! {self(),{command, Data7++"\n"}},
 1450: 	    Pid ! {send_line, ok},
 1451: 	    toerl_loop(Port,Acc);
 1452: 	{_Pid, kill_emulator} ->
 1453: 	    Port ! {self(),{command, "init:stop().\n"}},
 1454: 	    Timeout1 = timeout(long),
 1455: 	    receive
 1456: 		{Port,eof} ->
 1457: 		    normal
 1458: 	    after Timeout1 ->
 1459: 		    {error, kill_timeout}
 1460: 	    end;
 1461: 	{Port, eof} ->
 1462: 	    {error, unexpected_eof};
 1463: 	Other ->
 1464: 	    {error, {unexpected, Other}}
 1465:     end.
 1466: 
 1467: millistamp() ->
 1468:     erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond).
 1469: 
 1470: get_data_within(Port, X, Acc) when X =< 0 ->
 1471:     ?dbg({get_data_within, X, Acc, ?LINE}),
 1472:     receive
 1473: 	{Port,{data,{Tag0,Data}}} ->
 1474: 	    ?dbg({?LINE,Port,{data,{Tag0,Data}}}),
 1475: 	    {Tag0, Acc++Data}
 1476:     after 0 ->
 1477: 	    case Acc of
 1478: 		[] ->
 1479: 		    timeout;
 1480: 		Noeol ->
 1481: 		    {noeol,Noeol}
 1482: 	    end
 1483:     end;
 1484: 
 1485: 
 1486: get_data_within(Port, Timeout, Acc) ->	
 1487:     ?dbg({get_data_within, Timeout, Acc, ?LINE}),
 1488:     T1 = millistamp(),
 1489:     receive 
 1490: 	{Port,{data,{noeol,Data}}} ->
 1491: 	    ?dbg({?LINE,Port,{data,{noeol,Data}}}),
 1492: 	    Elapsed = millistamp() - T1 + 1,
 1493: 	    get_data_within(Port, Timeout - Elapsed, Acc ++ Data); 
 1494: 	{Port,{data,{eol,Data1}}} ->
 1495: 	    ?dbg({?LINE,Port,{data,{eol,Data1}}}),
 1496: 	    {eol, Acc ++ Data1}
 1497:     after Timeout ->
 1498: 	    timeout
 1499:     end.
 1500: 
 1501: get_default_shell() ->
 1502:     Match = fun(Data) ->
 1503: 		    case lists:prefix("undefined", Data) of
 1504: 			true ->
 1505: 			    yes;
 1506: 			false ->
 1507: 			    case re:run(Data, "<\\d+[.]\\d+[.]\\d+>",
 1508: 					[{capture,none}]) of
 1509: 				match -> no;
 1510: 				_ -> 'maybe'
 1511: 			    end
 1512: 		    end
 1513: 	    end,
 1514:     try
 1515: 	rtnode([{putline,""},
 1516: 		{putline, "whereis(user_drv)."},
 1517: 		{getline_pred, Match, "matching of user_drv pid"}], []),
 1518: 	old
 1519:     catch _E:_R ->
 1520: 	    ?dbg({_E,_R}),
 1521: 	    new
 1522:     end.
 1523: 
 1524: %%
 1525: %% Test I/O-server
 1526: %%
 1527: 
 1528: start_io_server_proxy() ->
 1529:     spawn_link(?MODULE,io_server_proxy,[#state{}]).
 1530: 
 1531: proxy_getall(Pid) ->
 1532:     req(Pid,{self(),getall}).
 1533: proxy_setnext(Pid,Data) when is_list(Data) ->
 1534:     req(Pid,{self(),next,Data}).
 1535: proxy_quit(Pid) ->
 1536:     req(Pid,{self(),quit}).
 1537: 
 1538: req(Pid,Mess) ->
 1539:     Pid ! Mess,
 1540:     receive
 1541: 	{Pid, Answer} ->
 1542: 	    Answer
 1543:     after 5000 ->
 1544: 	    exit(timeout)
 1545:     end.
 1546: 
 1547: io_server_proxy(State) -> 
 1548:     receive
 1549:         {io_request, From, ReplyAs, Request} ->
 1550:             case request(Request,State) of
 1551:                 {Tag, Reply, NewState} when Tag =:= ok; Tag =:= error ->
 1552:                     reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply),
 1553:                     io_server_proxy(NewState);
 1554:                 {stop, Reply, _NewState} ->
 1555:                     reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply),
 1556:                     exit(Reply)
 1557:             end;
 1558:         %% Private message
 1559:         {From, next, Data} ->
 1560:             From ! {self(), ok},
 1561:             io_server_proxy(State#state{nxt = Data});
 1562:         {From, getall} ->
 1563:             From ! {self(), lists:reverse(State#state.q)},
 1564:             io_server_proxy(State#state{q=[]});
 1565:         {From, quit} ->
 1566:             From ! {self(), lists:reverse(State#state.q)},
 1567: 	    ok;
 1568:         _Unknown ->
 1569:             io_server_proxy(State)
 1570:     end.
 1571: 
 1572: reply(From, ReplyAs, Reply) ->
 1573:     From ! {io_reply, ReplyAs, Reply}.
 1574: 
 1575: request({put_chars, Encoding, Chars}, State) ->
 1576:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{put_chars, Encoding, Chars} | State#state.q ]}};
 1577: request({put_chars, Encoding, Module, Function, Args}, State) ->
 1578:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{put_chars, Encoding, Module, Function, Args} | 
 1579: 			    State#state.q ]}};
 1580: request({get_until, Encoding, Prompt, M, F, As}, State) ->
 1581:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), State#state{nxt = eof, q = [{get_until, Encoding, Prompt, M, F, As} | State#state.q]}};
 1582: request({get_chars, Encoding, Prompt, N}, State) ->
 1583:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), State#state{nxt = eof, 
 1584: 									   q = [{get_chars, Encoding, Prompt, N} |
 1585: 										State#state.q]}};
 1586: request({get_line, Encoding, Prompt}, State) ->
 1587:     {ok, convert(State#state.nxt, Encoding, State#state.mode), 
 1588:      State#state{nxt = eof, 
 1589: 		 q = [{get_line, Encoding, Prompt} | 
 1590: 		      State#state.q]}};
 1591: request({get_geomentry,_}, State) ->
 1592:     {error, {error,enotsup}, State};
 1593: request({setopts, Opts}, State) when Opts =:= [{binary, false}]; Opts =:= [list] ->
 1594:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{setopts, Opts} | State#state.q ], mode = list}};
 1595: request({setopts, Opts}, State) when Opts =:= [{binary, true}]; Opts =:= [binary] ->
 1596:     {ok, ok, State#state{q=[{setopts, Opts} | State#state.q ], mode = binary}};
 1597: request(getopts, State) ->
 1598:     {ok, case State#state.mode of
 1599: 	     list -> [{binary,false}];
 1600: 	     binary -> [{binary, true}]
 1601: 	 end, State#state{q=[getopts | State#state.q ]}};
 1602: request({requests, Reqs}, State) ->
 1603:     multi_request(Reqs, {ok, ok, State}).
 1604: 
 1605: multi_request([R|Rs], {ok, _Res, State}) ->
 1606:     multi_request(Rs, request(R, State));
 1607: multi_request([_|_], Error) ->
 1608:     Error;
 1609: multi_request([], State) ->
 1610:     State.
 1611: 
 1612: convert(Atom,_,_) when is_atom(Atom) ->
 1613:     Atom;
 1614: convert(Data, unicode, list) ->
 1615:     unicode:characters_to_list(Data,unicode);
 1616: convert(Data, latin1, list) ->
 1617:     try
 1618: 	L = unicode:characters_to_list(Data, unicode),
 1619: 	[ true = Ch =< 255 || Ch <- L ],
 1620: 	L
 1621:     catch
 1622: 	_:_ ->
 1623: 	    {error, {cannot_convert, unicode, latin1}}
 1624:     end;
 1625: convert(Data, unicode, binary) ->
 1626:     unicode:characters_to_binary(Data,unicode,unicode);
 1627: convert(Data, latin1, binary) ->
 1628:     case unicode:characters_to_binary(Data, unicode, latin1) of
 1629: 	Bin when is_binary(Bin) ->
 1630: 	    Bin;
 1631: 	_ ->
 1632: 	    {error, {cannot_convert, unicode, latin1}}
 1633:     end.
 1634: 
 1635: atom2list(A) ->
 1636:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~w", [A])).
 1637: 
 1638: chomp([]) ->
 1639:     [];
 1640: chomp([$\n]) ->
 1641:     [];
 1642: chomp([H|T]) ->
 1643:     [H|chomp(T)];
 1644: chomp(<<>>) ->
 1645:     <<>>;
 1646: chomp(<<$\n>>) ->
 1647:     <<>>;
 1648: chomp(<<Ch,Rest/binary>>) ->
 1649:     X = chomp(Rest),
 1650:     <<Ch,X/binary>>;
 1651: chomp(Atom) ->
 1652:     Atom.
 1653: 
 1654: do(Fun) ->
 1655:     {_,Ref} = spawn_monitor(fun() ->
 1656: 				    exit(Fun())
 1657: 			    end),
 1658:     Ref.
 1659: 
 1660: done(Ref) ->
 1661:     receive
 1662: 	{'DOWN',Ref,process,_,Result} ->
 1663: 	    Result
 1664:     end.
